thread.title: Mike Pisa
thread.title_full: Reservation Counter reviewed by Mike Pisa

author: Mike Pisa
title: Mike Pisa
text:
The idea that we could get such a good values for a wonderful hotel while on a driving trip and have the flexibility to cancel up until 2 days prior made this a great option, not that we intend to cancel but situations do arise while travelling and this is comforting.
I was looking at another site that did not offer the cancellation option, I am glad I used this site.
